XIII.i.3.A.5.a
.
Eligibility for Outpatient Medical Services
Veterans who are enrolled in the VA healthcare system are eligible for outpatient medical services as defined in
38 CFR 17.38
.
Veterans are assigned to one of eight enrollment priority groups at the time of enrollment.Â The priority group designation determines whether a co-payment will be required for outpatient services.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Information on Eligibility for Medical Services
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
